articles.title: North Side Notifies South Side of Its Stand on Trial Train Operation
Agreement Signed between Korean and Cuban Parties
articles.content:
North Side Notifies South Side of Its Stand on Trial Train Operation 
    Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Pak Jong Song, head of the north side's group for the working contact for the reconnection of rail and road links between the north and the south of Korea, sent the following notice to Hong Kwang Phyo, chief delegate of the south side's group, informing it of the north side's stand on the north-south trial train operation on Wednesday:
 It is our view that it is impossible to conduct the trial operation of a north-south train on May 25 as scheduled, given that the military authorities of both sides have failed to take any measure for a military guarantee, the south side is creating a very unstable situation unfavorable for holding such a national event as the trial train operation as evidenced by the pro-U.S. ultra-right conservative forces' frantic acts of burning the flag of the dignified DPRK, recklessly attacking the June 15 forces almost every day and pushing the situation in Korea to an extreme phase of confrontation and war as your side is aware of these developments.    
 We will wait for an appropriate time to come for the trial train operation between the north and the south after a military guarantee is provided by the military authorities of both sides and the situation in the south returns to normal.

articles.title: Korea's Building of Powerful Nation Supported
articles.content:
Agreement Signed between Korean and Cuban Parties 
    Havana, May 22 (KCNA) -- An agreement on exchange between the Workers' Party of Korea and the Communist Party of Cuba was signed here on May 19.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK's side were members of the WPK delegation led by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and Pak Tong Chun, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and from the opposite side were Esteban Lazo, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and vice-president of the Cuban Council of State, Fernando Remirez, head of the International Department of the CPC Central Committee, and others.    
 The agreement was inked by Kim Ki Nam and Fernando Remirez.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Institute 
    Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Chinese Institute of Contemporary International Relations.
 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Ji Zhiye, vice-president of the institute who is leading its delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.content:
Korean General Federation of Science and Technology
    Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean General Federation of Science and Technology (KGFST) has a large share in the efforts of updating the national economy.
 The KGFST takes the lead in equipping the economy of the country with modern and information technology in accordance with the requirements of the Songun era.
 It has widely disseminated advanced science and technology through scientific and technical festivals, symposiums on science and technology and various other functions.
 It directs the April 15 technical innovation shock brigade drive for developing the nation's science and technology. April 15 technical innovation shock brigade teams comprising tens of thousands of technicians and skilled workers are now active at several-thousand industrial establishments and co-op farms across the country.
 The KGFST organizes technical innovation emulation among the teams active at the Rakwon Machine Complex, Kusong Machine-tool Factory, Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, Musan Mine Complex and many other big units which have a big influence on the national economy, thus making a substantial contribution to the economic construction and improvement of the people's living standard.    
 Meanwhile, the KGFST is conducting brisk scientific and technical exchange with foreign countries.    
 It, founded on April 14, Juche 35 (1946), has developed into a powerful scientific and technical organization with tens of affiliated associations and scientific societies and a well-arranged organizational system in provinces, cities, counties, industrial establishments and co-op farms across the country.

articles.title: Joint Statement of Chongryon and Mindan Hailed in Japan
Protocol of 9th Meeting of Forestry Sub-Com. Signed between DPRK and Russia
articles.content:
Joint Statement of Chongryon and Mindan Hailed in Japan
    Tokyo, May 22 (KNS-KCNA) -- At the fourth general meeting of the Tokyo District Assemblymen's Liaison Society for Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship held in Tokyo on May 17, Seizaburo Eguchi, representative of the Liaison Society and member of the Nakano District Assembly, warmly congratulated the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and the south Korean Residents Association in Japan (Mindan) on their adoption of the May 17 joint statement. And he called for deepening exchanges with Koreans in Japan in the future to strengthen the movement for Japan-Korea friendship.
 The general meeting was also addressed by Pak Chang Gil, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, and other personages.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Comoros
articles.content:
Protocol of 9th Meeting of Forestry Sub-Com. Signed between DPRK and Russia
    Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- A protocol of the 9th meeting of the Forestry Sub-committee of the Committee for Cooperation in Trade, Economy and Science and Technology between the governments of the DPRK and the Russian Federation was signed here on Wednesday.
 At the signing ceremony, the protocol was inked by Ri Jin Son, vice-minister of Forestry, from the DPRK side and Ivan Matsyorov, vice-minister of Industry and Energy who is leading the Russian delegation of forestry, from the Russian side.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Jordan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Comoros
    Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on May 23 sent a congratulatory message to Ahmed Abdallah Mohamed Sambi upon his election as president of Comoros.
 Kim, in the message, expressed the hope that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow in scope and develop and wished the president successes in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Eritrea
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Jordan
    Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Abdullah, king of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the independence of Jordan on Wednesday. 
 Expressing the belief that the bonds of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to expand and develop in mutual interests, the message wished the Jordanian people new prosperity and welfare.

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Sao Tome and Principe
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Eritrea
    Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Issaias Afewerki, president of Eritrea, on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of its independence.
 In the message Kim wholeheartedly wished the president and the people of Eritrea greater successes in their work to build a stable and prosperous, new society.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservatives' Moves to Reverse Trend of History under Fire
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Sao Tome and Principe
    Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Tome Vera Cruz upon his appointment as prime minister of Sao Tome and Principe.
 Expressing the belief that the bonds of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, the message wholeheartedly wished the prime minister greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.
